query:
SELECT p.*, s.name as serviceName, s.smshubCode, c.name as countryName, c.smshubId, a.name as apiName
FROM prices p
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
LEFT JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
ORDER BY p.apiId
command:

JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
